Instruction: Cut each fig in half lengthwise.
Place the fig halves cut side up on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
Drizzle honey over the fig halves.
Sprinkle with chopped fresh rosemary, sea salt, and black pepper.
Roast in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the figs are softened and caramelized.
Remove from the oven and let cool slightly.
Serve warm as a sweet and savory side dish.
